name: Presto
long_description: Presto automates big chain restaurants like McDonald's, Starbucks, KFC, Chili's with a combination of Computer Vision, Voice AI, payments and advanced hw/sw solutions.  We're obsessed with introducing next-gen tech to advance physical industries and delight consumers.
one_liner: Digital meets physical for big chain restaurants

name: Mobydish
all_locations: Austin, TX, USA; San Francisco, CA, USA; Remote
long_description:
MobyDish, a tech-enabled service, allowing anyone to place a catering order online in less than 3min to feed people from 10 to 1,000 people. We select the best restaurants, hire and train our fleet of drivers who will deliver and setup and we're proud to have the best customer service in the space. We also offer on site catering host and premium service that can be requested in up to 48hours in advance. 
We own our tech from online ordering, to manage and dispatch orders to drivers, and build customer relationship. 

We're used by top companies in the biggest cities in the US and we help for our customers with any needs from breakfast, lunch, happy hour and dinner. We are known for our flexibility, reliability and provide recurring and last-minute catering orders.
one_liner: MobyDish, a tech-enabled service, allowing anyone to place a catering…

name: teaBOT
all_locations: Toronto, ON, Canada; Chicago, IL, USA
long_description:
teaBOT offers an amenity-as-a-services to offices and showrooms. Your staff and clients will love coming to your space and sharing their custom-made tea blend with colleagues and guests! 

Offices like Google, HubSpot, and McKinsey use teaBOT as a recruiting and retention tool to have their teams love coming into the office!

Details at www.teabot.com

name: Bistrobot
long_description: Bistrobot makes robots that make sandwiches. No more long lines and no more wrong orders, just good food fast. And the coolest part is you get to watch a robot make you lunch.
one_liner: We make robots that make sandwiches.

name: Pearl
long_description:
Pearl lets any office, hotel or restaurant serve the world's best coffees & teas at the push of a button.  

Pearl's proprietary brew technology matches the speed and convenience of a Keurig without using wasteful, low-quality coffee pods.   

Our fully compostable single-servings contain freshly roasted whole bean coffees & teas sourced from premier roasters and importers.  We handle installation, upkeep, and automatic re-stocking of an evolving menu that's tailored to your preferences.  

Say goodbye to bad office coffee and upgrade your mornings today!
one_liner: The future of office coffee.  Keurig convenience meets cafe quality.

name: Pop Meals
all_locations: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
long_description: Pop is building Asia’s leading food brands through a network of cloud kitchens and tech-enabled QSR outlets. Funded with over $28m by Y Combinator and leading tech investors from Silicon Valley, Europe and Asia, we are expanding rapidly across Asia.
one_liner: Pop Meals is a restaurant chain without chefs. All recipes are…

name: Beanstalk
long_description:
Brothers, Michael and Jack, started Beanstalk as a solution to solve a local restaurant’s need for consistent, high-quality salad. In doing so, they created a vertical farming technology capable of growing lettuces, spinach, basil, carrots, lavender, and more.

Beanstalk is at the nexus of industrial robotics, plant science, and the culinary arts. Our technology enables us to develop new products quickly, automate traditionally labor-intensive work, and connect consumers to fresh produce in ways not before seen.
one_liner: Great tasting produce, farmed around the corner

name: Mezli
long_description:
At Mezli, we're building "auto-kitchens", fully autonomous shipping-container restaurants that serve great, affordable meals for takeout and delivery.

While at Stanford, the three of us got fed up with having to either cook every day or spend $10 or more for healthy options like Chipotle, Sweetgreen, etc. So, we decided to democratize access to healthy, convenient food by building Mezli.
one_liner: Autonomous restaurants that make great, affordable meals.

name: Bite Ninja
long_description: Our platform enables fast food and quick service restaurant workers to take orders and payments remotely

name: StrideQ
long_description:
StrideQ (formerly SliceQ) is the automated phone ordering system for restaurants which ensures no missed calls and no missed orders. Surprisingly, 33% of restaurant customers still prefer ordering via phone calls, but front desk staff is often busy and revenue is lost.

After enabling StrideQ our customers have increased their sales by over 10%, even while dealing with staff shortages in covid times.

Phone ordering is our wedge to become the point of sale system for all restaurants. StrideQ also streamlines dine-in and online orders in one single system. It helps to run restaurants more easily by effectively managing operations during weekend peak rush.
one_liner: Automated phone ordering system for restaurants
